verses.roman:
śuniyā vallabha-bhaṭṭa haila nirvacana
ghare yāi' mane duḥkhe karena cintana

synonyms: śuniyā—hearing; vallabha-bhaṭṭa—Vallabha Bhaṭṭa; haila—became; nirvacana—speechless; ghare yāi'-returning home; mane—in the mind; duḥkhe—unhappy; karena cintana—began to consider.
translation: Hearing this, Vallabha Bhaṭṭa was speechless. He returned home greatly unhappy and began to consider thus.
